properties.description: Print preference settings.
properties.name: printPreferences

properties.description: The name of the Book.
properties.name: name

properties.description: The full path to the Book, including the name of the Book.
properties.name: fullName

properties.description: The full path to the file.
properties.name: filePath

properties.description: If true, the Book has been modified since it was last saved.
properties.name: modified

properties.description: If true, the Book has been saved since it was created.
properties.name: saved

properties.description: Preflight book option settings.
properties.name: preflightBookOptions

properties.description: EPub export preference settings.
properties.name: epubExportPreferences

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the Book (a Application).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: The index of the Book within its containing object.
properties.name: index

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: A collection of preferences objects.
properties.name: preferences

properties.description: A collection of book content objects.
properties.name: bookContents

properties.description: Current style source document. Can return: Document or BookContent.
properties.name: styleSourceDocument

properties.description: Page numbering options for book content objects within the book.
properties.name: repaginationOption

properties.description: If true, inserts a blank page as necessary to fill in page number gaps caused by the odd or even specification set in the repagination option.
properties.name: insertBlankPage

properties.description: If true, automatically updates page numbers when pages in book content files are added, deleted, or rearranged.
properties.name: automaticPagination

properties.description: If true, automatically converts the book content object during repagination and synchronization.
properties.name: automaticDocumentConversion

properties.description: If true, merges identically named layers when exporting to PDF.
properties.name: mergeIdenticalLayers

properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.
properties.name: label

properties.description: If true, synchronize table of content styles.
properties.name: synchronizeTableOfContentStyle

properties.description: If true, synchronize text variables.
properties.name: synchronizeTextVariable

properties.description: If true, synchronize table styles.
properties.name: synchronizeTableStyle

properties.description: If true, synchronize paragraph styles.
properties.name: synchronizeParagraphStyle

properties.description: If true, synchronize character styles.
properties.name: synchronizeCharacterStyle

properties.description: If true, synchronize trap styles.
properties.name: synchronizeTrapStyle

properties.description: If true, synchronize master pages.
properties.name: synchronizeMasterPage

properties.description: If true, synchronize object styles.
properties.name: synchronizeObjectStyle

properties.description: If true, synchronize swatches.
properties.name: synchronizeSwatch

properties.description: If true, synchronize cell styles.
properties.name: synchronizeCellStyle

properties.description: If true, synchronize bullets and numbering.
properties.name: synchronizeBulletNumberingList

properties.description: If true, synchronize conditional text.
properties.name: synchronizeConditionalText

properties.description: How to match styles with same name while synchronizing a book.
properties.name: smartMatchStyleGroups

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

parameters.description: Whether to invoke the print dialog (Optional)
parameters.name: printDialog

parameters.description: Printer preset to use. Can accept: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset. (Optional)
parameters.name: using
saving
parameters.description: Whether to save changes before closing the Book (Optional)
The file in which to save the Book (Optional)
parameters.name: savingIn

parameters.description: The comment for this version (Optional)
parameters.name: versionComments
forceSave
parameters.description: Forcibly save a version (Optional)
The file path. Note: Required only if the book has not been previously saved. If the book has previously been saved, specifying a path saves a copy and closes the original book. (Optional)
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: The comment for this version. (Optional)
parameters.name: versionComments
forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.description: Exports the book to a file.

parameters.description: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: The file to which to export the book. (Optional)
parameters.name: to
showingOptions
parameters.description: Used to specify if the PDF Export Options Dialog needs to be shown or not (Optional)

Used to specify the presets for the export which can be the object of the preset type, enumeration for existing presets or user defined presets, or a string naming the preset to be used, but in case Showing Options is true, the preset specified in the Export Dialog will over ride this parameter (Optional)
parameters.name: using

parameters.description: Used to specify a list of book content references, from the current book, where the list may contain duplicate entries and if the list is not specified then the entire book contents shall be exported (Optional)
parameters.name: whichDocuments

parameters.description: The comment for this version. (Optional)
parameters.name: versionComments
forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.name: exportFile

methods.description: Synchronizes the entire book to the style source document.
methods.name: synchronize

methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameters.description: The key.
parameters.name: key

parameters.description: The value.
parameters.name: value

methods.name: insertLabel

methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameters.description: The key.
parameters.name: key

methods.name: extractLabel

methods.description: Updates chapter numbers and paragraph numbers throughout the book.
methods.name: updateChapterAndParagraphNumbers

methods.description: Update all numbers (e.g. Page numbers, chapter numbers and paragraph numbers) throughout the book.
methods.name: updateAllNumbers

methods.description: Updates the cross references in the entire book.
methods.name: updateAllCrossReferences

parameters.description: The folder, alias, or path in which to place the packaged files.
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: If true, copies fonts used in the document to the package folder.
parameters.name: copyingFonts

parameters.description: If true, copies linked graphics files to the package folder.
parameters.name: copyingLinkedGraphics

parameters.description: If true, copies color profiles to the package folder.
parameters.name: copyingProfiles

parameters.description: If true, updates graphics links to the package folder.
parameters.name: updatingGraphics

parameters.description: If true, copies fonts and links from hidden layers to the package.
parameters.name: includingHiddenLayers

parameters.description: If true, ignores preflight errors and proceeds with the packaging. If false, cancels the packaging when errors exist.
parameters.name: ignorePreflightErrors

parameters.description: If true, creates a package report that includes printing instructions, print settings, lists of fonts, links and required inks, and other information.
parameters.name: creatingReport

parameters.description: The comments for the version. (Optional)
parameters.name: versionComments
forceSave
parameters.description: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

methods.description: Preflight a book and optionally save the resulting report.

parameters.description: The preflight report to save to. (Optional)
parameters.name: to
autoOpen
parameters.description: If true, automatically open the report after creation. (Optional)

captures
